title: Projects
text: I don't just build software, I build long term relationships and products that I'm proud of.

work_items.name: CareerPrepped
work_items.description: Online talent development solution for the career education community which creates a global, competency-based talent community where soft skills are continuously developed and claims for both soft and hard skills are proven.

work_items.name: Army's Baby Closet
work_items.description: Army's Baby Closet is a sample eCommerce application for a baby clothes retailer.

work_items.name: Crown Clothing
work_items.description: Crown Clothing is a sample eCommerce application built for a Turkish clothing manufacturer (Bebus) to demonstrate that there are better ways of building usable experiences which are targeted for business growth.

work_items.name: Africa's Talking
work_items.description: AfricasTalking Laravel package is an open source developer tool built for the PHP's Laravel framework which allows software developers to easily integrate SMS and Voice communications into their web applications leveraging Africa's Talking telco infrastructure.
